title: NTPC board approves Rs 9,700 cr investment for 800 MW Sipat project
description: "The Board of Directors of the Company, in its meeting held on 19th September 2024, has accorded investment approval for Sipat Super Thermal Power Project, Stage-III (1x800 MW) at an appraised current estimated cost of INR 9,790.87 crore," as per the BSE filing.
